title: Immaculate, large 1 bedroom condo rental with parking & heat included
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   UPDATED 1 Bed Condo w/ASSIGNED PARKING INCLUDED & HEAT INCLUDED - Swanky walnut stained, hardwood floors throughout, tile floors in kitchen & bath steam cleaned & regrouted, and new modern roller shades. Unit features great space, tons of kitchen cabinet storage, stainless steel appliances including built-in microwave & dishwasher & fridge & stove, lots of closet space, crown molding in living & dining room, and large extra storage unit included.  New Peterson Metra stop opening in 2023! Pet free to-date, but cats okay. No smoking. Call today to schedule a showing!  (Owner is a licensed Illinois Broker)
